title: Duncan Baker – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Duncan Baker, the Conservative MP for North Norfolk, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content: As the country faces some incredibly difficult financial challenges, Rishi [Sunak] is clearly the best person suited to deal with them.
Guiding us through these times makes him the right person not just for the party but more importantly for the country right now.
